At that time, Captain Kirk may have been alive. I deemed it necessary to return the Tholian fire for the safety of the Enterprise. The Tholian ship has been disabled. But as a result of the battle, we must accept the fact that Captain Kirk is no longer alive.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: A crewman goes berserk and is carried out by three security men.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Take him to Sickbay. Put him in restraint.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: I shall not attempt to voice the quality of respect and admiration which Captain Kirk commanded. Each of you must evaluate the loss in the privacy of your own thoughts.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Attention. (a respectful pause) Dismissed.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: Everyone starts to file out.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: There is a duty to be performed in the Captain's quarters, which requires our presence.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: It can wait, Doctor. My duties require my immediate presence on the bridge.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: The Captain left a message tape. It was his order that it be reviewed by both of us, should he ever be declared dead. You have just declared Jim dead.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: It will wait for a more suitable moment, Doctor.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Why? Are you afraid it'll change your present status?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: The mental and physical state of this crew are your responsibility, Doctor. At the moment, they are your top priority.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: The Captain's last order is top priority, and you will honour that order before you take over.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Context: looking at a medal
Text: He was a hero in every sense of the word, yet his life was sacrificed for nothing. The one thing that would have given his death meaning is the safety of the Enterprise. Now you've made that impossible, Mister Spock.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: We came here for a specific purpose, Doctor.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Maybe not the same one. I really came here to find out why you stayed and fought.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: The Captain would have remained to recover a crew member at the risk of his own life or even his own ship.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes, he would, Mister Spock, but you didn't have that decision to make. What would you gain by fighting the Tholians? You could have assured yourself of a captaincy by leaving the area. But you chose to stay. Why?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: I need not explain my rationale to you or any other member of this crew. There is a margin of variation in any experiment. While there was a chance, I was bound legally and morally to ascertain the Captain's status.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: You mean to be sure if he was dead. Well, you made certain of that.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: That is enough, Doctor. We both have other things to do.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes, I have something to do. If this crew is to survive, I have to find an antidote to this space you've locked us into.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: You will return to your duty as soon as we've discharged our responsibilities here.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: There's no hurry, Mister Spock. The antidote probably doesn't concern you. Vulcans are probably immune, so just take your time.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: Spock enters the combination to the Captain's safe.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I must admit I don't understand you, Spock, but I just can't believe that you would want Jim's command. You must know that if you get us out of this situation, they'll pin a medal on your chest and give you command of the Enterprise.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Doctor, I am in command of the Enterprise.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I would like to remedy that situation.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: If you believe I have acted irregularly, then relieve me of duty. That is your prerogative as medical officer of this ship.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Bones, Spock. since you are playing this tape, we will assume that I am dead, that the tactical situation is critical, and both of you are locked in mortal combat. It means, Spock, that you have control of the ship and are probably making the most difficult decisions of your career. I can offer only one small piece of advice, for whatever it's worth. Use every scrap of knowledge and logic you have to save the ship. But temper your judgment with intuitive insight. I believe you have those qualities, but if you can't find them in yourself, seek out McCoy. Ask his advice. And if you find it sound, take it. Bones, you've heard what I've just told Spock. Help him if you can. But remember he is the Captain. His decisions must be followed without question. You might find that he is capable of human insight and human error. They are most difficult to defend, but you will find that he is deserving of the same loyalty and confidence each of you have given me. Take care.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Spock, I, er, I'm sorry. It does hurt, doesn't it?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: What would you have me say, Doctor?

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: The intercom whistles.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Spock here.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Mister Spock, we have a readout on the Tholian tractor field. I think we can estimate its approximate completion time.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: I shall be there shortly. Doctor, I believe we each have our respective tasks to complete before the Tholians complete theirs.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: Uhura is obviously off-duty as she has changed out of her uniform. She is just putting on a necklace when she is hit by searing pain in her body. Then she catches sight of a ghostly image in the mirror.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Captain! Captain Kirk, we thought you were

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: But the image fades away. She dashes out.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Spock! Mister. Oh, Doctor I've just seen the Captain.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Of course you have, Uhura. We would all like to

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: He's alive. He's alive, Doctor.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Of course.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Believe me, I did see him. I did. Spock! Mister Spock!

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: We're going to Sickbay.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Doctor. Doctor, I'm not going mad. I did see Captain Kirk. I've got to get to Mister Spock.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: She faints in his arms.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: An engineer succumbs to space-madness and attacks Scott. Two others haul him off.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Scott to Captain.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Scott to Captain.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Spock here. Proceed, Mister Scott.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: One of our crewmen just went berserk, but we have him under control for the moment.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Report to Doctor McCoy all symptoms noted prior to the attack.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Spock out.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: We can hear Chekov's cries as he struggles against the restraints in Sickbay.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chapel
Text: Doctor McCoy,

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes, Nurse.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chapel
Text: I have the diagnosis of the crewman who attacked engineer Scott. It was definitely due to the deteriorative effects of interspace.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes, it's beginning to spread generally throughout the ship.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chapel
Text: Are we any closer, Doctor?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: No, except I'm positive that it's a theragen derivative that's the answer. And it better be the next one.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: The web is getting close to completion all around the Enterprise.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: Whilst Chekov writhes against invisible foes, Uhura lies quietly on the bed.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Mister Spock didn't believe me either, did he, Doctor?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Well, nobody saw him but you, Uhura.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Then I didn't really see him, did I?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I don't think so.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Will I become like Chekov, Doctor?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: No, no. We're working hard. We'll find an antidote.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: O'Neil has a dizzy spell.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: We're beginning to interphase.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: O'Neil
Text: I'm all right.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Scott to Bridge.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Bridge. Spock here.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Are we slipping into interspace?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Negative. We are relatively stable at the moment.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Why do you ask?

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: Scott sees a ghostly image floating by the ladders to the upper level. It's Kirk.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: I don't believe it.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: Then it is gone.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: What is it, Mister Scott?

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: McCoy enters.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Mister Scott?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Mister Spock.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: I've just seen Captain Kirk. He was standing there as plain as we are.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: And then he just disappeared.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Report to the bridge immediately.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Sounds like a horror story. Suppose there's any truth in it?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: In critical moments, men sometimes see exactly what they wish to see.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Do you suppose they're seeing Jim because they've lost confidence in you?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: I was merely stating a fact, Doctor.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: It's getting critical. There have been a number of assaults down on the lower decks. Even Scotty's being affected. If Scotty goes under, that's the finish of whatever chance we have of getting the Enterprise out of here.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Please leave that to me, Doctor McCoy. I realise that the crew are your prime concern. You can best serve them in your laboratory. I urge you to confine yourself to it until a remedy has been found.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Spock! It must be this space. It's getting to me too. I know it's nothing you've done, Spock. I, I'm sorry.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: I understand, Doctor. I'm sure the Captain would simply have said forget it, Bones.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: McCoy collapses as Scott enters.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Mister Spock, look!

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: The image of Kirk is there, apparently calling out to them.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Captain? Captain? Captain.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: The image disappears.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: McCoy releases the straps on Uhura's bed.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Am I all right, Doctor?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes, Uhura, you're fine.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Then what I saw

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: It was real.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Captain Kirk's alive?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: We all saw him. The Captain's still alive.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chapel
Text: Nurse Chapel to Doctor McCoy.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: McCoy here.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chapel
Text: Results of the last theragen test are ready for you, Doctor.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I'll be right there.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Then your fears about that phaser were correct. It blasted a hole right through that crazy space fabric, and only heaven knows where it sent the Defiant.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Exactly. But the Captain remained. Only the overlap time changed. The next interphase will occur here.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: A diagram on a desk monitor.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Can you be ready?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: That'll be about twenty minutes. Aye, she'll be back together. But we'll only have about eighty percent power built up.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: It will have to do, Mister Scott. (door buzzer) Come.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: McCoy enters carrying a tray with a flask of orange liquid and three shot glasses.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: What have you got there?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Compliments of the house. To your good health and the health of the crew.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: You've found the antidote, Doctor.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes, and I've ordered it orally or intravenously for everyone aboard the ship. I would like for you gentlemen to drink it down.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Ensign Chekov was affected so early. Has he responded to it?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: He's his smiling self again. I've discharged him from Sickbay.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: What is it?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: It's a diluted theragen derivative.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Theragen? A nerve gas used by the Klingons.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Aye. And deadly, too. What are you thinking of, Doc? Are you trying to kill us all?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: If I remember correctly, it caused fatality only when used in pure form.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: That's right, and in this derivative, mixed with alcohol, it merely deadens certain nerve inputs to the brain.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Oh, well, any decent brand of Scotch will do that.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: One good slug of this, and you can hit a man with phaser stun, and he'd never feel it or even know it.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Does it make a good mix with Scotch?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: It should.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: I'll let you know. (leaves with the remaining contents of the flask)

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Well, drink it down, Spock. It's the human thing to do. That's a medical order, Captain.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Welcome back, Lieutenant.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Thank you, sir.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Your absence was keenly felt, Mister Chekov.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Thank you, Mister Spock.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Estimated time for completion of the Tholian web.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Two minutes, sir.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Are the ships computers programmed for entry into interspace?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Yes, sir. The ship can drive into interspace at any time.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Spock to engineering.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Scott here.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Prepare for interphase in

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Fifteen seconds.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: Aye, sir. Standing by.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Sulu
Text: Mister Spock, they're closing the web.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Interphase in ten seconds. Nine, eight

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: Chapel and McCoy enter.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Seven, six, five

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Stand by with full power.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Four, three

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Scott
Text: She's only up to seventy six percent.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: It will have to do.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: One.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Ready to transport on my order.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: Kirk appears on the viewscreen.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: I see him.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: There he is!

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Sulu
Text: It's the Captain. Sir, the tractor field is activating.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: We're being pulled out of here.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Try to maintain position Mister Sulu.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Sulu
Text: I can't, sir.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Engineering, bring ship's power up to full capability.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: There's a massive jolt, then the Enterprise disappears from inside the web and reappears in open space.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Where are we now, Mister Spock?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Captain, we have destroyed the Tholians' web.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Negative, Ensign. Utilising ship's power has thrown us clear of it. Compute the distance from the original location.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: At once, sir.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Have we lost the Captain?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: We shall soon see, Lieutenant.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: The ship has been thrown exactly two point seven two parsecs distant from our previous position.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Good. Since the Captain was locked into our transporter beam when we were thrown clear of the interphase area, he should've been drawn here with us. Spock to transporter room.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: McCoy here.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: The Captain's oxygen supply is running out now. Are you standing by with a hypo of tri-ox compound for him?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I'm ready, Mister Spock.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Prepare to transport on the Captain's co-ordinates on my order.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: O'Neil
Text: Ready, Mister Spock.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: Kirk appears on the viewscreen again.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Mister Spock, it's him! It's the Captain!

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: I see him, Ensign. I see him. Now, Doctor.

Title: The Tholian Web
Context: It takes a couple of attempts, but Kirk is beamed safely aboard and promptly falls to his knees. McCoy injects him while Chapel removes his helmet.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Bones.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Welcome home, Jim.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I had a whole universe to myself after the Defiant was thrown out. There was absolutely no one else in it. I must say I prefer a crowded universe much better. How did you two get along without me?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Oh, we managed. Mister Spock gave the orders, and I found the answers.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Good. No problems between you?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: None worth reporting, Captain.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Try me.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Only such minor disturbances as are inevitable when humans are involved.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Which humans, Mister Spock?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: He means when humans become involved with Vulcans, Jim.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Ah, yes. I understand. Well, I hope my last orders were helpful in solving any problems that you don't feel worth reporting.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: Orders, Captain?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: What orders are you referring to, Jim?

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Kirk
Text: My last orders. The last orders that I left for both of you. The last taped orders.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Oh, those orders. Well, there wasn't time. We never had a chance to listen to them.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Spock
Text: No. You see, the crisis was upon us, and then passed so quickly, Captain, that we

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Good. Good. Well, I hope we won't have similar opportunities to test those orders which you never heard. Ahead warp factor two, Mister Sulu.

Title: The Tholian Web
Speaker: Sulu
Text: Warp factor two, sir.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: The Enterprise is at Red Alert as six missiles head towards it. Spock is in the Captain's chair.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Do we have maximum magnification, Lieutenant?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Sulu
Text: Yes, sir.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Kirk enters.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Missile spread, Mister Spock.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Very archaic type, Captain. Sub light speed.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Scott
Text: Aye, and chemically fuelled to boot, sir.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Anything on communications, Lieutenant Uhura?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Uhura
Text: No, sir. All bands clear.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Course of the missile, Mister Spock?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: It would appear that the Enterprise is the target, Captain.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Prepare phaser banks one and two, Mister Sulu.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Sulu
Text: Aye, sir.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Chekov, get a fix on the missile's point of origin.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Aye, Captain.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Sulu
Text: Phasers one and two locked in and ready.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Fire phasers. (the missiles are obliterated) Mister Chekov, alter course to the missile's point of origin.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Aye, sir.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Warp factor three, Mister Sulu.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Sulu
Text: Warp factor three, sir.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Chapel
Text: I am a nurse first, Doctor McCoy, and a member of the crew of the Enterprise second.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: You're excused. You may return to your quarters.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Chapel
Text: No, I'm sorry, Doctor. I've called the Captain and I'll wait until he comes.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Kirk enters.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: What's the emergency?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I said you were excused, Nurse. Please, Christine. I promise you I'll give the Captain a full report.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Chapel leaves.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: That was quite a scene.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I've just completed the standard physical examinations for the entire crew.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Excellent. What's the emergency?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: The crew is fit. I found nothing unusual, with one exception.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Serious?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Terminal.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: What is it?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Xenopolycythemia. It has no cure.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Who?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: He has one year to live.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Who is it?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: The ship's Chief Medical Officer.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: You.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I'll be most effective on the job in the time left, if you'll keep this to yourself.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Narrator
Text: Captain's log, stardate 5476.3. I have just had the sad duty of informing Starfleet about Doctor McCoy's condition and have requested an immediate replacement.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: The Enterprise has arrived at an asteroid.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Spock.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Yes, Captain?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Confirm Chekov's co-ordinates for the missile's point of origin.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Correct, Captain. We are approaching those co-ordinates.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: That object on the screen?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: An asteroid, two hundred miles in diameter.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Could the enemy vessel be hiding behind the asteroid?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Negative, Captain. We've had that area on scanners constantly.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Then the asteroid is the missile's point of origin.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Correct, Captain.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Full sensor probe, Mister Spock.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Typical asteroid chemically, but it is not orbiting. It is pursing an independent course through this solar system.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: How could that be? Unless it's powered. A spaceship?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: It is under power, Captain. And correcting for all gravitational stresses.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Source of power?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Atomic. Very archaic. Leaving a trail of debris and hard radiation.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Chekov, plot the course of the asteroid vessel.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Aye, sir.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Asteroid has an outer shell, which is hollow. It surrounds an independent inner core, which has a breathable atmosphere. Sensors read no life forms.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Scott
Text: Then it must be on automatic controls.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Then the passengers, or builders, are dead.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Course of asteroid, I mean spaceship two four one mark one seven.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Interesting.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Yes?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: The course Ensign Chekov just gave for the asteroid would put it on a collision course with Daran Five.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Daran Five? Inhabited?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Correct. Population approximately three billion and seven hundred twenty four million, if memory serves me correctly. Estimated time of impact three hundred ninety six days.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Sulu, match Enterprise speed with that of the asteroid vessel. Mister Spock and I are transporting aboard. Mister Scott, you have the conn.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Scott
Text: Aye, sir.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Chapel
Text: A lot can happen in a year. Please, give yourself every minute.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Doctor McCoy, Mister Spock and I will handle this.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Without me, Jim? You'd never find your way back.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Well, I think it would be wiser if

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I'd like to go. I'm fine, Captain.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: All right, Doctor. If that's what you want.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Dead flat soil, rocky outcrops, orange sky.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: You'd swear you were on the surface of a planet.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: One fails to see the logic in making a ship look like a planet.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Wouldn't know this was a spaceship. Kirk to Enterprise.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Scott
Text: Enterprise. Scott here.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Transported without incident. Kirk out.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: They go exploring and see large tubular structures sticking out of the ground.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: No apparent opening.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: You found no intelligent life forms, Mister Spock, but surely

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: The asteroid ship is over ten thousand years old, Doctor. Still no sign of life forms, Captain.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Two tubes lift up to reveal openings and aggressive men in plaid suits leap out and attack them. A woman watches. McCoy sees her and gets knocked out. Kirk and Spock are overpowered. The phasers and communicators are handed to her.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: These are weapons?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Of a sort. Weapons, communication devices. Let me go to my friend.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: She allows Kirk to go to McCoy.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: You all right?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I think so.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: I am Natira, the high priestess of the people. Welcome to the world of Yonada.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I can't say I think much of your welcome.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Take them.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Everyone gets inside the tube and goes down the stairs. Natira leads the way along a corridor. The people bow to her.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Natira opens the door by waving her hands in front of carved symbols.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: You will kneel.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Kirk, Spock and McCoy kneel. Natira steps onto a pentagonal platform and kneels in front of an obelisk with a sun-burst on it.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: She called this the world. These people don't know they're on a spaceship.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: They've been in flight ten thousand years. Maybe they don't realise it.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Oh, Oracle of the people, most perfect and wise. Strangers have come to our world. They bear instruments we do not understand.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: She stands and turns to face the three.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Who are you?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: They stand too.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I am Captain Kirk of the starship Enterprise. This is my medical officer, Doctor McCoy. My first officer, Mister Spock.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: For what reason do you visit this world?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: We've come in friendship.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: There's a sound of lightning.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: Then learn what it means to be our enemy before you learn what it means to be our friend.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: The away team are lit up as if by electricity. They collapse, unconscious.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: They wake up in a nicely furnished room. McCoy and Spock are lying down, Kirk slumped over a table.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Spock. (he wakes) Doctor McCoy. Bones. Bones?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: But McCoy doesn't wake.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: The doctor must have received an excessively large electrical shock.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: No, that's not it.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Nothing else could've caused this, Captain. At least nothing that has happened here.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: You're right, Spock. The shock was serious because of McCoy's weakened condition.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: May I ask precisely what is troubling the doctor?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I don't think he would've told you himself, but I think you should know now. It's xenopolycythemia.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Yes. I know of it, Captain.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Then you know that nothing can be done.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: McCoy finally wakes up.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Bones, how is it?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I'm all right. Are you all right, Mister Spock?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Very well, Doctor. The Captain and I seem to have suffered no ill effects.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Oh, that Oracle really got to me. I must be especially susceptible to its magic spells.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Spock knows.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Well, we'd better get to the control room.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Are you in any condition to get up?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Don't worry. I can make it, Jim.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Captain, informing these people they're on a ship may be in violation of the Prime Directive of Starfleet Command.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: No. The people of Yonada may be changed by the knowledge, but it's better than exterminating them.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Logical, Captain.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: And the three billion on Daran Five.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Also logical, Captain.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Gentlemen, I believe we have a visitor.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: A silver-haired old man in purple and orange looks around nervously before bowing then taking a bottle from his cummerbund. He hands out tablets.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Man
Text: For strength. Many of us have felt the power of our Oracle. This has been of benefit.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: It tastes like an ancient herb derivative.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Man
Text: You are not of Yonada.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: No, we're from outside your world.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Man
Text: Where is outside?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Up there. Outside, up there, everywhere.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Man
Text: So they say, also. (he winces in pain) Many years ago I climbed the mountains, even though it is forbidden. (another wince)

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Why is it forbidden?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Man
Text: I am not sure. (wince) But things are not as they teach us. For the world is hollow, and I have touched the sky.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Now he clutches his head as he collapses in agony.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: What is it, Bones?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: There's something under the skin. (a red light goes out) He's dead.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: For the world is hollow, and I have touched the sky.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: He said it was forbidden to climb the mountains.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Yes, of course it is, because if you did you'd touch the sky and find out that you were living on a big ball. Not a planet, but a spaceship. And that knowledge seems to be forbidden.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Natira arrives with two women bearing food and drink.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: What happened?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: We don't know. He just suddenly screamed in pain and died.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Context: to woman) Fetch the guard. (kneels and prays) Forgive him for he was an old man, and old men are sometimes foolish. But it is written that those of the people who sin or speak evil shall be punished. (guards arrive
Text: He served well for many years. Take him away, gently.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: The body is removed, and McCoy sits down.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: You do not seem well. It is distressing to me.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Oh, no. I'm quite all right, thank you.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: It is the will of the Oracle that you now be treated as honoured guests.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: She goes to help the women prepare the food and pour drink.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: You seem to be the special favourite.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Indeed, Doctor. The young lady did show a marked preference for your company.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Well, now. Nobody can blame her for that, can they?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Personally, I find the lady's taste questionable, but she obviously prefers you, and you obviously don't seem to mind. If you could arrange to be alone with the young lady, Spock and I would be left alone to find the power controls of this world.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: It is time to refresh yourselves.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Glasses are handed out.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Thank you, Mister Spock. To our good friends of Yonada.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: We are very interested in your world.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: That pleases us.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Good. Then you wouldn't mind if we looked around?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Not at all. The people know of you now. (to McCoy) Are you well enough to go about?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Perhaps not.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Then why not remain here? Rest. We will talk.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: You are very kind.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: You are free to go about and meet our people.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Thank you. And thank you for taking care of Doctor McCoy.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Not at all. We shall make him well.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Spock.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Kirk and Spock leave. One woman offers a plate of food.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: No, thank you.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Leave us.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: The women leave.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I'm curious. How did the Oracle punish the old man?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: I cannot tell you now.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: There is some way the Oracle knows what you say, isn't there?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: What we say, what we think. The Oracle knows the minds and the hearts of all the people. I did not know you would be hurt so badly.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: It's all right. I suppose we had to learn the power of the Oracle.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: McCoy, there is something I must say. Since the moment I. It is not in the manner of the people to hide their feelings.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Honesty is usually wise.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Is there a woman for you?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: No, there isn't.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Does McCoy find me attractive?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Oh, yes. Yes, I do.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: I hope you men of space, of other worlds, hold truth as dear as we do.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: We do.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: I wish you to stay here on Yonada as my mate.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: But we're strangers to each other.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: But is not that the nature of men and women? That the pleasure is in the learning of each other?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Let the thought rest in your heart, McCoy.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Incredible as it may seem, these people have no idea they're living on a spaceship.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I wonder how many generations have lived out their lives and been buried here without ever knowing that their world is hollow.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: The people, in the fullness of time, will reach a new world. Rich, green, lovely to the eyes, and of a goodness that will fill the hearts of the people with tears of joy. You can share that world with me, rule it by my side.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: How long will it take you to reach this new world?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Soon. The Oracle will only say soon.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: If you only knew how I needed some kind of future, Natira.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: You have lived a lonely life?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes, very lonely.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: No more, McCoy. There will be no more loneliness for you.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: There's something I need to tell you.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: There is nothing you need to say.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: But there is.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Then tell me, if the telling is such a need.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I have an illness for which there is no cure. I have one year to live.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Until I saw you, there was nothing in my heart. It sustained my life, but nothing more. Now it sings. I could be happy to have that feeling for a day, a week, a month, a year. Whatever the creators hold in store for us.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: They kiss.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Captain, the Oracle room.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: The problem, to get in.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: I believe that I can. (Kirks stops him as women walks past) The writing is definitely Fabrini, Captain. I recognise it.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Fabrini? Didn't the Fabrini sun go nova and destroy its planets?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Yes. Towards the end, the Fabrini people lived underground, as these people do, to protect themselves.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Some of them must have been put aboard this ship and sent to another planet. And these are their descendants. (Once the coast is clear.) Now.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Spock waves his hand in front of some symbols and the door opens.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: The Oracle doesn't seem to know we're here. I wonder what alerted it the first time.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Captain. If I remember correctly, the oracle's reprehensible conduct was initiated when Natira knelt on that platform.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I think you're right. Continue investigating. The clue to the location of the control room must be around here somewhere.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Spock reads the wall panels.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Nothing here which would indicate this is anything but a planet. There's no question but that the creators would be considered gods.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: They spot an unusual obelisk.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: This plaque is a representation of a star and its solar system.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Eight planets, Captain. That is the number in the Fabrina solar system.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Then there's no doubt these people are the descendants of the Fabrini.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: And no doubt they've been in flight on this asteroid ship for ten thousand years.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: The door opens. They hide behind the obelisk as Natira enters and kneels on the platform.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: Speak.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: It is I, Natira.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: Yes, Natira.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: It is written only the high priestess of the people may select her mate.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: It is so written.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: The strangers among us, the three visitors. There is one called McCoy. I wish him to remain here as my mate.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: Does he agree to this?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: I have asked him. He has not yet given me his answer.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: He must become one of the people, worship the creators, and agree to the insertion of the Instrument of Obedience.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: He will be told what must be done.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: If he agrees to all things, it is permitted. Teach him our laws carefully so he commits no sacrilege, no offence against the people or the creators.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: It will be done, o most wise.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: She gets up, opens the door, and electricity hits Kirk and Spock. She dashes back to the platform.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: Who are the intruders?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Two of the strangers, Kirk and Spock.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: McCoy is not with them?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: No.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: Kirk and Spock have committed sacrilege. You know what must be done.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: I know. (guards run in) When the oracle releases them, take them. Fools. You think we are children? You think you can do as you please, commit whatever offence amuses you?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: What are you going to do to my friends?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: They entered the Oracle room.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: And the punishment is death?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Yes. I can make no other decision. We gave them our trust, they betrayed us.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: They acted out of ignorance, Natira.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: They said they came in friendship.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Please let them return to the ship.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: I cannot.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: For me? I've made my decision. I'm staying here, on Yonada. Natira, what they did, they did because they felt they had to. Please, let them return to the ship. You won't regret it. How do you think I'd feel if I stayed here with the chance to be happy for the first time in my life, but knowing my friends had died?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Yes. So be it. This I will do for McCoy. For our happiness and future.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: McCoy hands communicators to Kirk and Spock.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: You're returning with us?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: No, I'm not.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Bones, this isn't a planet. It's a space ship on a collision course with Daran Five.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I'm on a kind of a collision course myself, Jim.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Doctor McCoy, I order you to return with us.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: And I refuse.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Bones, if we can't correct the course of this ship, we'll have to blast it out of space.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I intend to stay on this ship, with these people, whatever happens.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Your decision is most illogical, Doctor.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Is it, Mister Spock? Is it really? Natira's asked me to stay, and I'm staying.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: As her husband?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes. Is that too much to ask, Jim?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Kirk to Enterprise.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Scott
Text: Scott here, Captain.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: We're beaming over. Lock in on our signal.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Scott
Text: Aye, Captain.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: And transport Mister Spock and myself immediately.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Scott
Text: But, Captain, what about Doctor McCoy?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: He's staying, Scotty. Kirk out.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: McCoy is kneeling on the platform.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: To become one of the people of Yonada, the Instrument of Obedience must be made part of your flesh. Do you now give your consent?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I do.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: Proceed.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Say now, because once done, it is done.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Let it be done.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: She touches his head with the device in her hands.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: You are now one with my people. (she kneels beside him) May I give you the love you want, and make the time you have beautiful.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: We're now of one mind.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: One heart.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: One life.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: They kiss.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: It is done, O most wise. Our living link with the creators.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: Teach him, then, what he must know as one of the people.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Natira takes McCoy to the obelisk that Kirk and Spock were looking at when they got caught. She touches three of the planets and it opens to reveal a white-covered book.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: This is the Book of the People, to be opened and read when we reach the new world of the promise. It was given by the creators.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Do the people know the contents of their book?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Only that it tells of our world here and why soon, one day, we must leave it for the new world.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Has the reason that the people must leave here been revealed to you?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: No, it has not.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Don't you long to know its secrets?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: No. It is enough for me to know that we shall understand all when we reach our home.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Narrator
Text: Captain's Log, stardate 5476.4. We are on a parallel course with Yonada. It is still on a collision course with Daran Five. Our failure to correct its course and the critical nature of Doctor McCoy's illness made the extraordinary event of contact with Starfleet Command imperative.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Admiral
Text: Captain Kirk, I sympathise with your wish to stay, but I hope you recognise the necessity that you continue your mission at once.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: That is the problem, sir.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Admiral
Text: Perhaps haven't made myself clear. Let me restate it. You have been relieved of all responsibility for the asteroid ship Yonada. Starfleet Command will take care of the situation. (end of conversation)

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: I believe it's time to move on.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Yes. Those are the orders.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Uhura
Text: Captain Kirk. Bridge to Captain Kirk.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Kirk here.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Uhura
Text: An urgent call from Doctor McCoy, sir.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Put him on.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Jim.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Yes, Bones.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: We may be able to get these people back on course.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: You've located the controls?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: No, but I've seen the book that contains all the knowledge of the creators. And if you

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: He gets a warning pain, but fights through it.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: If you can get to it, Spock

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Can dig out the information.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Where is it?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: McCoy collapses, crying out in pain.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Bones, are you all right?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Bones, answer me! Bones, what is it? (Natira runs in.) Bones, what is it? McCoy, what's happening? What's happening, McCoy?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: A short while later, Kirk and Spock beam in.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: You are killers of your friend. I will have you put to death.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Help him.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Until you are dead, he will think of you and disobey! I will see you die!

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Spock, take care of McCoy.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Kirk drags Natira away so Spock can remove the Instrument of Obedience.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Context: in tears
Text: He is not part of our people. You've released him from his vow of obedience.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: We have freed him from the cruelty of your Oracle.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: McCoy.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Bones. Bones. You said something about a book. Where is it?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: They must not know.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: The Oracle room.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: You will never see the book. It is sacrilege! Guards! Guards! Guards!

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Now listen to me. You must listen to what I have to say. Give me one moment to speak to you. One moment. Natira, if you don't believe what I'm about to tell you, you can call the guards. We'll accept any punishment you decree.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: What do you wish to say?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: You must believe that what I'm about to tell you is the truth.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Your truth, of your world.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Yes, my world and your world of Yonada.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: You don't obey the law of the creators. How can you understand my world?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I understand. I understand, Natira. Ten thousand years ago, a sun was dying and with it, its world. It's the world you see on the plaque in the room of the Oracle.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: That is a world of which Yonada is a part.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: No. It is the world of your ancestors, your creators. It no longer exists.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: You are mad.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: No, I'm not. Now listen to me! Hear me out. When your ancestors discovered that their world was dying they built a great ship and chose their best people. They wished for their race to survive. They sent the ship out into space.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: You wish me to believe that Yonada is a ship?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Yes.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: But we have a sun. It did not die. At night I see the stars.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: No. You are living inside a hollow ball. Your ancestors created it to take you on a journey to a promised new planet.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Why should the (she gets a pain) Why should the truth wait for you to come to Yonada?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Because a flaw developed in the controls. And unless we correct it, Yonada will kill millions of people and destroy a world it doesn't even know.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Why should the truth be kept from us? Why should the creators keep us in darkness? No. No, you do not speak the truth. I believe only the Oracle. I believe!

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Let us remove the instrument of obedience, the way we did for McCoy. Natira.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: She runs from the room.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Do you think she understood me?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Spock opens the door, looks out, nods to passers-by.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: She evidently understood something. There are no guards to detain us.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: You have listened to the words of the non-believers.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Yes. I have listened.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: That was the first transgression. You felt the pain of warning?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Yes, I did.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: Why did you listen further?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: They said they spoke the truth.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: Their truth.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Is truth not truth for all?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: The truth of Yonada is your truth. There can be no other for you. Repent your disobedience.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: I must know the truth of the world!

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: She falls unconscious, off the platform. Kirk, McCoy and Spock enter. McCoy cradles her as she wakes.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Your friends have told me of your world.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: They spoke the truth.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: I believe you. I believe. The creators kept us in darkness. There's nothing I can do. I believe with you, husband.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: McCoy removes her Instrument of Obedience.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Is she all right?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: She will be. I'll stay here with her. The book is in the monolith.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: It is sacrilege to the temple.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: We do this for the survival of the people of Yonada.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: You are not believers. You are forbidden to gaze at the book.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: We mean no desecration to the faith of Yonada. We must consult the book to help you.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Oracle
Text: It is blasphemy. You are forbidden. The punishment is death.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: A strong wind blows, and some of the panels on the wall glow deep red. The air shimmers in the heat.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Temperature one hundred eleven degrees and rising.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: McCoy, how do you open this thing?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Temperature one hundred fifteen degrees.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Press the three lower planets on the left-hand side simultaneously.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Kirk does, and takes the book.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: One hundred twenty degrees.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Here. The plan must be in there. Is it indexed?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Yes, it is.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Hurry, Spock.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: It refers to the altar. Apply pressure to the centre until it opens.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: The altar slides forward, revealing a small door to another room which is also shimmering in the heat. A room full of 1960's IBM-style computers. Spock gets to work flipping switches.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Let's get her out of the heat.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: I've neutralised the heating elements.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: It cools very quickly.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: We'll be all right here now, Jim.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: Kirk goes to join Spock.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: The oracle can no longer punish us.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Your friends have prevented it?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: And will they send this this ship again to the land the creators intended?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: That is good.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Active and functional. Not too different from the Enterprise.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: There seems to be a weakness in one of the eight tubes.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Enough to turn it off course?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Yes. Let me check that engine. A very simple problem, easy to correct.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Then come.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Context: They stand.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: No.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Don't be afraid.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: I do not fear the punishment of disobedience.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Narrator
Text: Well, then, come. We must hurry to join

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: No, I cannot go with you. It is not fear. I understand the great purpose of the creators. I shall honour it.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: You intend to stay here, on Yonada?

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: I shall stay willingly, and because that is what I must do.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Then I won't leave you.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: Will McCoy stay here to die? No. McCoy will not let go of life and the fullness of years.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Now more than ever, I wish to search through the universe to find a cure for myself and others like me. And I want you to be with me.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Natira
Text: This is my universe. You came here with a great mission to save my people. Shall I abandon them? Perhaps one day, if it is permitted, you will find Yonada again.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: I believe we can attempt the course correction, Captain.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Good. Going back to marked headings.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
Text: Guidance control's taking over. I believe we can allow this ship to go back to its automatic control.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Steadying on course marked in red.

Title: For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
Speaker: Spock
