Text: Beaming her up to the Enterprise will be less harmful than waiting.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: I don't know. I'm not sure.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Captain Kirk to the Enterprise. Captain Kirk to the Enterprise.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: Mister Scott, sir.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Scott. Prepare to beam the landing party aboard plus two others. One critically ill. Have a medical team standing by to receive the patient. Captain Kirk, out. Prepare to beam aboard.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Kirk is carrying Janice in his arms. He puts her on a gurney

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Doctor Coleman, accompany the patient to the Sickbay. Mister Spock, take the ship out of orbit. Resume designated course. Doctor McCoy. Doctor McCoy, you and Doctor Coleman seem to disagree on diagnosis.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: No, not entirely. We both agree it's radiation. Doctor Coleman isn't prepared to say what form of radiation.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Will it affect your arriving at a correct treatment?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: It's crucial.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Well, this is especially disturbing to me for personal reasons.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Oh? I didn't know you knew her that well.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Oh, yes. It's been a long time since I saw her. I walked out on her when it became serious.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Well, you must have been very young at the time, Jim.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Youth doesn't excuse everything, Doctor McCoy. It's a very unhappy memory for me.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I didn't realise that. I shall do everything in my power.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Thank you. Thank you very much.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: McCoy leaves

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: Doctor Lester is certainly a very lucky young person to have escaped.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Yes, very lucky. Very lucky.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Janice is delirious. Coleman is with her. Kirk enters

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: It just began.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Well you'd better put a stop to it! If you allow Doctor Lester to become fully conscious she'll know what has happened.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: Probably no one will believe it.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Probably?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: That's all we can ask for. How can death be explained now?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I tell you it can't continue.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: You killed every one of the staff. You sent them where you knew the celebium shielding was weak. Now why didn't you kill him? You had the perfect opportunity.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: There wasn't enough time.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: I gave you every minute you asked for.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: He hung onto life too hard. I couldn't

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: You couldn't because you love him. You want me to be his murderer.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Love? Him? I love the life he led. The power of a starship commander. It's my life now.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: I won't become a murderer.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: You are a murderer! You knew it was celebium. You could've treated them for it. You're a murderer many times over.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: McCoy and a now brunette Chapel enter

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Jim, what are you doing here?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I thought my presence might quiet Doctor Lester. It seems to have had the opposite effect.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: It has nothing to do with you. It's a symptom of the developing radiation illness.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Tests with the ship's equipment shows no signs of internal radiation damage, Doctor Coleman.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Didn't Doctor Lester's staff become delirious before they went off and died?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: Yes, Captain. Yes.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Doctor Lester could be suffering from a phaser stun as far as the symptoms I can detect, Jim.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Doctor Coleman, Doctor McCoy has had a great deal of experience with radiation exposure on board the Enterprise. I am guided by his opinion.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: Doctor Lester and her staff have been under my supervision for two years. If you don't follow my recommendations, responsibility for her health or her death will be yours.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Doctor McCoy, I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to take you off the case and turn it over to Doctor Coleman.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: You can't do this! On this ship my medical authority is final!

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Doctor Coleman wants to assume the full responsibility. Let him do it.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I won't allow it.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: It's done! Doctor Coleman, your patient. Doctor Coleman, didn't you suggest a sedation to rest the patient?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: Yes, Captain.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: It's not necessary, Jim. Can't you see she's coming around?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Janice opens her eyes, sees Kirk and has flashbacks to the transferal, just to remind us who is really who

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Doctor Coleman.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: Nurse, administer the sedative.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: A sedative is not wise at this time, Captain.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: Nurse Chapel, you have your orders.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Nurse Chapel, follow your instructions.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Chapel injects Janice

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Oh no. Am I really losing command of the Enterprise? No. Oh, no. Bad dream. Bad dream.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: James Kirk is returning to consciousness in the body of Janice Lester. The Enterprise is proceeding to its next mission, on the course set before I took over command. Now the years I spent studying every single detail of the ship's operation will be tested. With a little experience, I will be invulnerable to suspicion. At last I attain what is my just due. Command of a starship. All the months of preparation now come to fruition.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Course, Mister Chekov.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chekov
Text: One two seven mark eight.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Sulu, set speed at warp factor two.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Sulu
Text: Warp factor two, sir.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Chekov, plot a course for the Benecia Colony.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Direct course to Benecia, three seven three mark eight.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: How long to the colony at our present speed?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Forty-eight hours, sir.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Sulu, set course for the colony. Three seven three mark eight.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Sulu
Text: Aye, sir. Three seven three mark eight.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Captain, that will delay our work at Beta Aurigae. It means reversing course.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Yes, it can't be helped. We must take Doctor Lester to a place where she can be treated.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: May I point out that Starbase Two is on the direct route to our destination.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: How long to Starbase Two?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Seventy two hours, Captain.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: It's twenty four hours too long. Doctor Lester's condition is increasingly serious. Continue present course.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Sulu
Text: Aye, sir.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: If the diagnosis of Doctor Lester's illness is the critical problem, then the Benecia Colony is definitely not the place for her. Their medical facilities are the most primitive.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: They will have to serve.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Starbase Two is fully equipped and staffed with the necessary specialists to determine exactly what is wrong with the doctor. Is that not crucial to your decision?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Thank you, Mister Spock, but the facilities will be of little use if Doctor Lester's dead. Time is of the essence. Continue present course.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: At maximum speed, Starbase Two would still meet the emergency.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Lysa
Text: Captain, shall I advise Starfleet Command of the change of plan?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: No change of plan has been ordered, Lieutenant. Our arrival at Beta Aurigae will merely be delayed. Our gravitational studies of that binary system will not suffer, and a life may be saved! That is not unusual procedure for the Enterprise.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Sir, I believe Starfleet will have to be notified that our rendezvous with the starship Potemkin will not take place as scheduled.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Spock, if you'd concentrate on the areas for which you are responsible, Starfleet Command would've been informed already.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Since the captain usually deals directly with Starfleet in these matters, I assumed that my suggestions might be deemed interference.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Inform Starfleet of the delay, Lieutenant.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Lysa
Text: Aye, sir.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Continue present course. Increase speed to warp factor six.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Kirk is sitting at his desk, filing his nails

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I'll let my record speak for me.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Why are you being so defensive? There's no implied criticism of you in my order to remove you from the case.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: That is not the reason I'm here. I'm here because Doctor Coleman's record states that he's incompetent.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: That's the opinion of an individual.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: No, sir. That is the opinion of Starfleet Command. I checked with them. Doctor Coleman was removed from his post as Chief Medical Officer of his ship for administrative incompetence.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: There are no administrative duties required here.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: As well as flagrant medical blunders.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Promotions and demotions can be politically manoeuvred. You know that, Bones.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Not in Starfleet Headquarters, Captain. And certainly not in the Surgeon General's office.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I'm afraid the order will have to stand. I can only say that Doctor Coleman's experience with what happened on the planet had to be the deciding factor here. I'm sure that you can appreciate that.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I appreciate the fact that you had a decision to make. I also find myself in that position now, Jim, and I'm asking you to report for an examination.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: What? What do you base that on?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Development of emotional instability and erratic mental attitudes since returning from that planet.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: You'll never make that charge stick. Any fool can see why you're doing this.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I'll let Starfleet Command be the judge of my motives.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I won't submit to this petty search for revenge!

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: But you will submit to Starfleet regulations, and they state that the ship surgeon will require full examination of any crew member that he has doubts about, including the captain.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: intercom whistles

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Captain Kirk here.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Sulu
Text: Sulu here, Captain. Starfleet Command is requesting additional details on the delay.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I'll be right there.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Janice wakes up. She looks at the monitor above her bed

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Pulse, pressure, blood count, all body functions normal. Then why am I here?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Gets out of bed and notices that she is not herself

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Doctor McCoy? Doctor McCoy

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Coleman enters

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: Quiet would be best for you.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Where's Doctor McCoy?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: I'm in charge now.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Bring Doctor McCoy at once! He is in command of medicine on this ship.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: He was taken off your case by Captain Kirk.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: By Captain Kirk?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: It was done for your own protection, Doctor Lester.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: I am not Janice Lester! She did this to me! Now how can I make you understand? Janice has driven herself mad with jealousy, hatred and ambition.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Chapel enters

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Nurse Chapel. Bring Mister Spock and Doctor McCoy to me at once. Now they must believe I am not Janice Lester. I am imprisoned in her body, but I am not Janice Lester.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: She is suffering from the delusion of being Captain Kirk.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: I am not Janice Lester!

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: The paranoia has been developing for the past six months. The radiation seems to have intensified it. She must be kept sedated.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chapel
Text: Shall prepare a mild sedative, Doctor?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: Of course.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Chapel leaves

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Janice sees her reflection in a mirror

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: You are insane, Doctor Lester.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Narrator
Text: Captain's log, stardate unknown. I have lost track of time. I am still held captive in a strange body and separated from all my crew.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Janice wakes. There is a single restraining strap across the bed

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: I must've sounded quite mad to you before.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chapel
Text: What you've been through would've completely broken most of us.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Well, I'll be all right now. Could I see your Doctor McCoy?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chapel
Text: I'm afraid that's against Doctor Coleman's orders.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Oh. Is a visit by that very kind Mister Spock to be allowed?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chapel
Text: Perhaps that can be arranged before we reach the Benecia Colony.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: The Benecia Colony? But isn't the Enterprise going to rendezvous with the Potemkin at Beta Aurigae?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chapel
Text: Well, first we have to let you recuperate at Benecia. (offering a drink) You'll feel better if you have a little.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Well, I'll try. Thank you. Oh, it is good. Thank you. Could I finish it slowly, Nurse Chapel?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chapel
Text: Well

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: I promise I'll be good.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chapel
Text: Well, I'll be right back. I'm glad you're feeling so much better.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Chapel leaves, Janice pours the drink on the floor and breaks the glass against the bed. Then she uses it to cut the strap holding her down

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: These tests should help me pinpoint the cause of Jim's illness.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Good. Knowledge of the captain's aberrant behaviour is spreading through the ship. The crew is becoming increasingly tense.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes, well what worries me most is that Jim seems completely unaware that something is wrong with him. We've got to make him realise that something serious is happening before treatment can even begin.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: I'm afraid that is a forlorn hope, Doctor. The illness appears to be primarily mental.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: One of us should be able to get to him. I keep looking for an approach, but the speed at which the illness has traveled makes it doubly difficult.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Perhaps the Surgeon General's office should be alerted.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: You know headquarters, Spock. They're only interested in results of specific tests. So far all we have to offer are our opinions.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Are you sure that the captain will comply with your order in his present state of mind?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I'll use my medical authority to enforce it if necessary.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Doctor, we are treading on very thin ground. Actions such as these might be misinterpreted.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Well, then, so be it. Our responsibility is clear.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Whatever happened to the captain on that planet must've taken place in the short space of time that he was alone with Doctor Lester. Perhaps a conversation with her might shed some light.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Well, it's worth a try. Why don't you try to get to Doctor Lester while I examine Jim.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Kirk enters

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Well, gentlemen. I'm here, Doctor.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Janice has run down the corridor and now enters

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Spock. Bones. Help me. Don't let them lock me away from you. I've got to talk to you.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: She backs out into the corridor and Kirk follows her

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Kirk knocks her out

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Jim!

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: She might have killed someone.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Two security guards arrive

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Put her in isolation in her room. Maintain a twenty four hour watch. No one, absolutely no one, is to talk to her without my permission!

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Galloway
Text: Yes, sir.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Spock leaves

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Captain.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: McCoy and Kirk re-enter the exam room

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: How is the doctor?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Galloway
Text: She regained consciousness very quickly.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Good. I have questions to ask her.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Galloway
Text: Did the captain order it, sir?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Why should he? They are my questions, therefore I am ordering it, Lieutenant.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Galloway
Text: The captain said no one is allowed to speak to Doctor Lester.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Has such an order ever included his senior officers?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Galloway
Text: No, sir. Mister Spock, I think the captain meant that a guard should be present.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: By all means, Lieutenant.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Shirt off, Kirk is doing the heart rate exercise

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: That's enough. That's enough. Your heart will last forever, Captain.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: How am I otherwise?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: In the pink, as usual. Liver, kidney, blood count, metabolic rate. Everything, even your glands, functioning at their usual, normal peak of efficiency.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Good. I hope you're as pleased about it as I am.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Don't get dressed yet.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: You said I was in perfect condition.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Physically.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I don't think another test is necessary.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: The Robbiani dermal-optic is crucial. It reveals the basic emotional structure. You had one once before. Now I need another one to compare with that previous test. There should be no change in your dermal-optic reactions to the colour wavelengths. Over here, Captain. Over here, Captain.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Complete life-entity transfer with the aid of a mechanical device?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Yes, that's what it must've been.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: To my knowledge, such total transfer has never been accomplished with complete success anywhere in the galaxy.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: It was accomplished and forgotten long ago on Camus Two. I am a living example.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: That is your claim. As yet, it is unsubstantiated by any external evidence or objective tests.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Nevertheless, Spock, it is the truth I'm speaking.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Narrator
Text: Kirk is being bathed in coloured light with his eyes closed)

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Now lower your arms and open your eyes.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: At this moment Doctor McCoy is examining the captain for psychological changes. If any facts are uncovered, that would be acceptable evidence. The only kind which is acceptable to Starfleet Command and to the crew of the Enterprise.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Spock, when I was caught in the interspace of the  Tholian Sector, you risked your life and the Enterprise to get me back. Help me get back now. When the Vians of Minara demanded that we let Bones die, we didn't permit it.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: That is true. The captain did not. However, those events have been recorded. They could have become known to you.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: You are closer to the captain than anyone in the universe. You know his thoughts. What does your telepathic mind tell you now?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Under the watchful gaze of the guard, Spock does a quick mind-link

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: I believe you. However, my belief is not acceptable evidence. Evidence must be factual. Doctor McCoy may be of help. Come with me.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Galloway
Text: I'm sorry, sir, but Doctor Lester cannot leave here.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Well, are you satisfied with the results of the tests?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: There is no positive evidence of any disorder.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Galloway
Text: You're asking me to violate the captain's orders.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: He is not the captain.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Galloway
Text: You're as mad as she is. You're to leave here at once. I follow orders.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Certainly, Lieutenant. We all must do our duty.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Spock walks past him and feints a neck pinch. It is parried so he gets him with the other hand

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Galloway
Text: Security guard!

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Shaking hands

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: No hard feelings, Bones. You did your usual thorough, good job.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I'm sure everything's going to be all right.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Ensign
Text: Captain Kirk!

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Captain Kirk here.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Ensign
Text: Escape attempt by Doctor Lester.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Captain Kirk to Security. On the double to Doctor Lester's room!

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: It's quite all right, Ensign. Everything is under control.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Neck-pinches him as McCoy and Kirk arrive. Then two more security come out of the turbolift

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Phasers.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: A repetition of your physical violence is not called for, sir. No physical resistance will be offered.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Attention, all personnel. First Officer Spock has been placed under arrest. He has conspired with Doctor Lester to take over the ship from your captain. A hearing will be immediately convened to consider the charges and specifications of a general court martial on the charge of mutiny.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Narrator
Text: Captain's Log, stardate 5930.3. The results of Doctor McCoy's examination have given me complete confidence in myself. My fears are past. I shall function freely as the captain. I am the captain of the Enterprise, in fact.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Scott is questioning Spock, but the log entry obliterates some of the evidence

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: Surely you must have more than that to go on.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: I have stated my evidence. Telepathic communication with the mind of Captain James T. Kirk.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: Your evidence is completely subjective. We have to have evidence that we can examine out in the open.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: You've had great deal of evidence, except that of the chief witness. The one who should be the real subject of this investigation is kept locked away and in isolation. Why, Captain?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: She's dangerously insane. We've seen the evidence.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: She is dangerous only to your authority, sir.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Spock. Mister Spock, my authority has been given to me by Starfleet Command, and only that high authority can take it away.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: The witness, sir. Bring on the witness. Let your officers put the questions.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Lemli, have Doctor Janice Lester brought here.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Lemli
Text: Aye, sir.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: The security man leaves

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Doctor McCoy, while Mister Spock was busy with his ambitious plot, what were you doing?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Examining you.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Oh, yes. You were deeply concerned about my health, emotional and physical, since leaving Camus Two. Is that correct?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes, that's correct.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Instead of trying to destroy me, you were searching for ways to help me. Doctor McCoy, for the record, will you tell the court your findings?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: The captain is in the best of physical condition. His emotional and mental state is comparable to the time that he assumed command of the Enterprise.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Thank you, Doctor McCoy. Mister Spock, were you aware of Doctor McCoy's findings?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: I know them now.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: And what have you to say now?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: I am disappointed and deeply concerned that there is no objective evidence to support my position. So far.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Lemli enters with Janice and Coleman

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Doctor Coleman, if you're required here, we'll call you.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Coleman leaves. Janice takes the witness stand

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: We certainly appreciate your being here. Everyone is deeply aware that you have been subjected to inordinate emotional stress. We had hoped to avoid any further stress, but Mister Spock disagrees. It is his opinion that your testimony is important in determining the merits of his case. And since we are solely interested in arriving at a just decision, I'm going to have to ask you a few more questions. I'll try not to upset you. You claim that, that you are Captain James T. Kirk?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: No. I am not Captain Kirk. That is very apparent. I claim that whatever it is that makes James Kirk a living being special to himself is being held here in this body.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Oh. Well. However, as I understand it, I am Doctor Janice Lester.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: That's very clever, but I didn't say it. I said, the body of James Kirk is being used by Doctor Janice Lester.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: A subtlety that somehow escapes me. I assume that this switch was arrived at by mutual agreement.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: No. It was brought about by a violent attack by Doctor Lester and the use of equipment she discovered on Camus Two.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Violence by the lady, perpetrated on Captain Kirk? I ask the assembled personnel to look at Doctor Janice Lester and visualise that historic moment. Can you, can you tell me why Doctor Janice Lester would agree to this ludicrous exchange?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Yes. To get the power she craved, to attain a position she doesn't merit by temperament or training. And most of all, she wanted to murder James Kirk, a man who once loved her. But her intense hatred of her own womanhood made life with her impossible.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Are you prepared with witnesses? One will do.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Sir, there is only one issue here. Is the story of life-entity transfer believable? This crew has been to many places in the galaxy. They've been witness to many strange events. They are trained to know that what seems to be impossible often is possible, given the scientific analysis of the phenomenon.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Spock, have you ever heard of a case such as described by Doctor Janice Lester?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Not precisely, no.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Oh. Assuming that you are correct in your belief, do you expect Starfleet Command to place this er, this er, person in command of the Enterprise?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: I expect only to reveal the truth.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: And with the truth revealed, that I am not really the captain, and knowing that she would not be allowed to serve as the captain, then you would be the captain! It is inevitable! Spock. Spock, give it up! Return to the Enterprise family. All charges will be dropped and the madness that temporarily overcame all of us on Camus Two will fade and be forgotten.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: And what will become of Doctor Lester?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Doctor Lester will be cared for always. It is a debt and a responsibility I owe her from the past.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: No, sir. I shall not withdraw a single charge that I have made. You are not Captain Kirk. You have ruthlessly appropriated his body, but the life entity within you is not that of Captain Kirk. You do not belong in charge of the Enterprise and I shall do everything in my power against you.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Lieutenant Lysa, play back those last two sentences from Mister Spock's tirade.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: You do not belong in charge of the Enterprise and I shall do everything in my power against you.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: You heard the statements placed into the record by you. Do you understand the nature of it?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: I do. And I stand by it.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Context: thumping the table
Text: It is mutiny! Deliberate, vindictive, insane at its base! But mutiny is charged, and encouragement to mutiny. Doctor McCoy, Mister Scott, you heard it! On the basis of these statements, I call for an immediate vote, by the powers granted to me as captain of the Enterprise. A recess is declared, to be followed by a vote.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Yes, sir. An immediate vote before our chief witness can be left to die on some obscure planet with the truth locked away inside of her.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Silence. You will be silent! A recess has been declared. There will be no cross-discussion. When I return, we will vote on the charge of mutiny. The evidence presented here is the only basis of your decision.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Scotty.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: Doctor. Doctor, I've seen the captain feverish, sick, drunk, delirious, terrified, overjoyed, boiling mad. But up to now I have never seen him red-faced with hysteria. I know how I'm going to vote.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I've been through this with Spock. He's not being scientific and neither are you.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: It may not be scientific, but if Mister Spock thinks it happened, then it must be logical.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Don't you think I know that? My tests show there's nothing wrong with the captain. Now that's the only fact Starfleet's going to be interested in.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: Headquarters has its problems, and we have ours. And right now, the captain of the Enterprise is our problem. They're going to call for the vote in a few minutes. Let me put one last question. Suppose you vote with me, in favour of Spock. That means two votes to one and Spock is free. What do you think the captain'll do?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: I don't know.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: Aye, you know, all right. It'll stick in his craw. He'll never accept it.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: We don't know that.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: I tell you, he won't. Then, Doctor, that's the time we move against him. We'll have to take over the ship.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: We're talking about mutiny, Scotty.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: Aye. Are you ready for the vote?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Yes. I'm ready for the vote.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Play the tapes of the conversation in the corridor.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Lysa
Text: Aye, sir.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: Then's the time we move against him. We'll have to take over the ship.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: We're talking about mutiny, Scotty.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: Aye. Are you ready for the vote?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: That's enough. We know what was said.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Enough to convict you of conspiracy with mutineers. And you're so charged. The sentence, death. Mister Lemli.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Starfleet expressly forbids the death penalty.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: All my senior officers turning against me?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Sulu
Text: The death penalty is forbidden. There's only one exception.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chekov
Text: General Order Four. It has not been violated by any officer on the Enterprise.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I am responsible. The execution will be immediate. Go to your posts. Go to your posts.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Chekov and Sulu leave

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Mister Lemli, take them to the brig. Prepare for execution. Go on!

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Scott and McCoy are escorted out at phaser point. Janice follows and Spock follow, also under armed guard

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Sulu
Text: The captain really must be going mad if he thinks he can get away with an execution.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Captain Kirk wouldn't order an execution even if he were going mad. That cannot be the captain.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Sulu
Text: What difference does it make who he is? Are we going to allow an execution to take place?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chekov
Text: If security backs him up, how will we fight him?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Sulu
Text: I'll fight them every way and any way I can.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Kirk enters

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Lieutenant Lysa, inform all sectors of my decision. Have each section send a representative to the place of execution on the hangar deck. Mister Chekov, how far to the Benecia Colony?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Chekov
Text: Coming within scanning range.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Plot co-ordinates for orbit. Mister Sulu, lock into co-ordinates as soon as orbit is accomplished. Interment will take place on Benecia.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Chekov and Sulu remove their hands from their controls

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: You have received your orders! You will obey my orders. You'll be charged with mutiny! You will obey my orders or, or,

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: He starts convulsing, and Janice is doing the same in the brig

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: For a moment, I thought that I was up on the bridge.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: Perhaps you were.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Then it's possible the transference can be broken.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Well, if it happens again, I'll fight to stay there.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Scott
Text: The bridge is where you belong.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: To accomplish that, each one of us must be ready to seize any opportunity to break out of here and attack.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Arthur, the transference is weakening.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: What happened?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: For a moment, I found myself back with the prisoners. I will not go back to being Janice Lester. You must help me prevent it.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: The only way to prevent the transference is by the death of Janice Lester. You must carry out the execution.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I can't. I can't. The crew is in mutiny. You must kill her for me.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: I have done everything else for you. But I will not murder for you.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Then do it for yourself. If Kirk doesn't die, we'll both be exposed as murderers. Does that give you any choice?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Coleman gets a phaser and a hypo-spray

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: The dosage should be doubly lethal.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: It is.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: which strangely looks straight out into the corridor

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: To prevent further conspiracy, you will be removed to separate cells. If there's any resistance, you'll be given a sedative until you learn co-operation. Doctor Lester will be first. Follow Doctor Coleman.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Janice steps out into the corridor

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: May I point out, Captain

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Janice struggles with Coleman

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Kill him! Kill him!

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: Then Kirk goes into another convulsion. The rest of the prisoners stroll into the corridor as the transfer undoes itself

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Ohh! I've lost to the captain. I've lost to James Kirk! I want you dead! I want you dead! I want you dead! Oh, I'm never going to be the captain. Never. Kill him.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Context: She goes to Coleman's arms to weep

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: You are, you are as I loved you.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Janice
Text: Kill him.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Can you do anything for her?

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Coleman
Text: I'd like to take care of her.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Mccoy
Text: Of course. Come with me.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: I didn't want to destroy her.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Spock
Text: I'm sure we all understand that, Captain.

Title: Turnabout Intruder
Speaker: Kirk
Text: Her life could have been as rich as any woman's, if only. If only.
